name: titlecardmaker-webui
description: Automated Title Card creator for Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby.

scripts.cy:run:report: cypress run --record ; npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > cypress/results/output.json
scripts.cy:run:report:html: cypress run ; npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > cypress/results/output.json && npx marge cypress/results/output.json --reportDir cypress/results/ --inline
